name: Happy Monkey Banana Quest: Super Challenge Run
name_original: Happy Monkey Banana Quest: Super Challenge Run
description:
Are you ready for some fun, quality, gaming action? Meet your little monkey friend! He might be little, but he's going to collect as much energy as he can from the objects around him. You control his actions and lead him to the nourishment he needs. Just don't get him killed before he's finished!

Using your arrow keys, move your guy around the screen as he navigates between the objects that give him energy and the ones that would be detrimental to him. Eat the wrong thing and the game is over! Hit a wall and you're done! It might sound simple, but the fast-action of the game will keep you on your toes.

Fun for all ages, the object of the game might sound easy but it's still challenging enough for even the adults to enjoy! This is one app you won't want to stop playing until you've mastered it.

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
